packs.pack_description: Gives Axolotls a smiley face :).
Replaces the rare blue variant of the Axolotl with the unused green Axolotl skin.
Look into my eyes, and nothing but my eyes!
GET OUT OF MY HEAD GET OUT OF MY HEAD GET OUT OF MY HEAD.
Yeah...
Fish but its FLAT!
Retextures Turtles to look like Xisuma!
Retextures Squids and Glow Squids to look like Xisuma!
Changes the Wandering Trader texture to Xisuma's Green Team skin from Hermitcraft!
Changes Piglins, Zombified Piglins and Piglin Brutes' textures to Xisuma's Darth Vader Skin.
In honor of Technoblade. RIP.
Awful pack that makes Striders look like Stridey. Sorry.
Replace all Emerald items and blocks with Rubies!
Changes the Wither Boss texture to a Bee.
Changes Golden Apples to ilmango's icon to celebrate the digging of a perimeter in under 12 hours.

Changes the Enchanting Table language (AKA Standard Galactic) to use English alphabet characters. This will not help you with enchanting, as the words and phrases used in the Enchanting Table are randomly generated gibberish.
Changes English alphabet characters to Standard Galactic alphabet characters (AKA the Enchanting Table language).
Adds the almighty Baacon Beam to beacons! All hail the Bacon Beam!
Merges two of the most annoying features into one :).
Replaces the Spyglass overlay with the 'WHAT' meme template, including Earthbound's 'Sanctuary Guardian' music.
Reverses the Spyglass overlay, making the middle opaque and the sides transparent. It's useless, what did you expect?.
Changes the screaming goat sounds to the Screaming Goat meme from 2012.

packs.pack_name: I wish It Could Be Christmas Everyday
packs.pack_description: Gives Chests and Trapped Chests their Christmas textures all year-round.
The nightmare fuel from January Minecraft Monthly is real.

packs.pack_name: Anvil Falling Sound to Metal Pipe
packs.pack_description: Changes the anvil falling sound to the metal pipe sound meme.
Changes the Silence Armor trim to match Silentwisperer's face.
Turns a Trident into a stick. So you can throw and attack with sticks.
